PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-05431997-04-110PCO,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of JEAN-CHARLES CLOUTIER, of Limoges, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Public Service Staff Relations Board to hold office during good behaviour for a period of two years; and order that JEAN-CHARLES CLOUTIER shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective April 28, 1997.
Attachments
